H0.text: Lenny Bruce was in what field of entertainment in the 1960s. Actor

H1.text: Lenny Bruce was in what field of entertainment in the 1960s. Musician

H2.text: Lenny Bruce was in what field of entertainment in the 1960s. Playwright

H3.text: Lenny Bruce was in what field of entertainment in the 1960s. Stand-up

A4.text: Leonard Alfred Schneider (October 13, 1925 – August 3, 1966), better known by his stage name Lenny Bruce, was an American stand‑up comedian, social critic, and satirist.
